jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=XVO_FIO_01}了解、カトル。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=XVO_FIO_01}了解、カトル。

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_40_0553}ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_40_0553}ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ。

engChrName: So our destination is the outdoor experiment complex at the other end of this road, right?
engSearchText:
So our destination is the outdoor experiment complex
at the other end of this road, right?
jpnChrName: 目指すは峡谷外れにある 野外実験棟、ですね……！
jpnSearchText:
目指すは峡谷外れにある
野外実験棟、ですね……！

engChrName: That's right—but we're sure to run into monsters on the way. Be careful!
engSearchText:
That's right—but we're sure to run into monsters on
the way. Be careful!
jpnChrName: “敵”がいるかもしれません、 慎重に向かいましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
“敵”がいるかもしれません、
慎重に向かいましょう……！

engChrName: Quatre can now use the craft  .
engSearchText:
Quatre can now use the craft
.
jpnChrName: カトルのクラフト{CC_SKILL=SKILL_QUATRE_CRAFT_03}が使えるようになりました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>カトルのクラフト{CC_SKILL=SKILL_QUATRE_CRAFT_03}<C1>が使えるようになりました。

engChrName: There it is.
engSearchText: There it is.
jpnChrName: あったか……
jpnSearchText: あったか……

engChrName: It looks so dilapidated...
engSearchText: It looks so dilapidated...
jpnChrName: けっこう古い建物ですね……
jpnSearchText: けっこう古い建物ですね……

engChrName: It's the perfect place to conduct field research for the natural sciences, though.
engSearchText:
It's the perfect place to conduct field research for the
natural sciences, though.
jpnChrName: うん、自然科学のフィールドワークの 拠点としても使われている施設かな。
jpnSearchText:
うん、自然科学のフィールドワークの
拠点としても使われている施設かな。

engChrName: I get what you mean, but it sure doesn't LOOK like there's cutting-edge research being done in it.
engSearchText:
I get what you mean, but it sure doesn't LOOK like
there's cutting-edge research being done in it.
jpnChrName: ハン、最先端の研究が 行われているようには見えねえが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、最先端の研究が
行われているようには見えねえが……

engChrName: I can see some relatively recent footprints and tracks on the ground.
engSearchText:
I can see some relatively recent footprints and tracks
on the ground.
jpnChrName: ……比較的新しい足跡と 導力車の車輪の跡があります。
jpnSearchText:
……比較的新しい足跡と
導力車の車輪の跡があります。

engChrName: So if nothing else, it has certainly been in use.
engSearchText: So if nothing else, it has certainly been in use.
jpnChrName: 最近まで人が出入りしていたのは 間違いなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
最近まで人が出入りしていたのは
間違いなさそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. I wouldn't be surprised if that professor was being held hostage here.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I wouldn't be surprised if that professor was
being held hostage here.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの先生が 捕まってる可能性はあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの先生が
捕まってる可能性はあるだろう。

engChrName: Well, we'll find out soon en—
engSearchText: Well, we'll find out soon en—
jpnChrName: ……ええ……… とにかく中を確認して──
jpnSearchText:
……ええ………
とにかく中を確認して──

engChrName: A-A giant avian monster?!
engSearchText: A-A giant avian monster?!
jpnChrName: と、鳥型の大型魔獣……！？
jpnSearchText: と、鳥型の大型魔獣……！？

engChrName: It looks like a giant Gryeam! Be careful!
engSearchText: It looks like a giant Gryeam! Be careful!
jpnChrName: 鷲獅子（グリオン）型…… かなりの強敵かと！
jpnSearchText:
鷲獅子（グリオン）型……
かなりの強敵かと！

engChrName: This area must be its turf. Time to take it out!
engSearchText: This area must be its turf. Time to take it out!
jpnChrName: このあたりのヌシかなんかか…… 何とか追い払うぞ！
jpnSearchText:
このあたりのヌシかなんかか……
何とか追い払うぞ！

engChrName: Ugh... Back me up, FIO! XEROS!
engSearchText: Ugh... Back me up, FIO! XEROS!
jpnChrName: くっ…… ＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ、迎撃を！！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……
ＦＩＯ、ＸＥＲＯＳ、迎撃を！！

engChrName: Understood, Quatre!
engSearchText: Understood, Quatre!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=XVO_FIO_01}ＯＫ、カトル！
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=XVO_FIO_01}ＯＫ、カトル！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: {CC_VOICE=VO_40_0554}ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_VOICE=VO_40_0554}ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: That takes care of it. Good work, everyone.
engSearchText: That takes care of it. Good work, everyone.
jpnChrName: 撃破完了──お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: 撃破完了──お疲れ様です。

engChrName: That was rough... Somethin' up, Quatre?
engSearchText: That was rough... Somethin' up, Quatre?
jpnChrName: なんとかなったか── って、どうした？
jpnSearchText:
なんとかなったか──
って、どうした？

engChrName: Well, it's just that this area is absolutely used for field research by the institute on a regular basis...
engSearchText:
Well, it's just that this area is absolutely used for field
research by the institute on a regular basis...
jpnChrName: ……このあたりは理科大学でも定期的に フィールドワークが行われているんです。
jpnSearchText:
……このあたりは理科大学でも定期的に
フィールドワークが行われているんです。

engChrName: ...and yet I've never once heard reports of monsters like that one showing up here.
engSearchText:
...and yet I've never once heard reports of monsters
like that one showing up here.
jpnChrName: でも、峡谷道にこんな魔獣が出るなんて 聞いたことがなくて……
jpnSearchText:
でも、峡谷道にこんな魔獣が出るなんて
聞いたことがなくて……

engChrName: That goes for the monsters we found in the mining tunnel, too...
engSearchText:
That goes for the monsters we found in the mining
tunnel, too...
jpnChrName: ……いや、それを言うなら採掘道だって……
jpnSearchText: ……いや、それを言うなら採掘道だって……

engChrName: So we've got monsters popping up all over in places they really shouldn't be?
engSearchText:
So we've got monsters popping up all over in places
they really shouldn't be?
jpnChrName: ああ、本来居ねぇはずの魔獣が 現れたっつう話だったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、本来居ねぇはずの魔獣が
現れたっつう話だったか？

engChrName: Hmm... One possibility does come to mind.
engSearchText: Hmm... One possibility does come to mind.
jpnChrName: ……考えられるとしたら。
jpnSearchText: ……考えられるとしたら。

engChrName: Could be the abnormality's actually far below us.
engSearchText: Could be the abnormality's actually far below us.
jpnChrName: 異常が起きてるのは この下なのかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
異常が起きてるのは
この下なのかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: 下……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 下……ですか？

engChrName: Why below...?
engSearchText: Why below...?
jpnChrName: 地面の下に何か……？
jpnSearchText: 地面の下に何か……？

engChrName: ...You are as sharp as ever, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: ...You are as sharp as ever, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ……さすがはヴァン様。
jpnSearchText: ……さすがはヴァン様。

engChrName: I didn't expect you to connect this to the many other disturbances across this continent in recent years. Not so quickly, at least.
engSearchText:
I didn't expect you to connect this to the many other
disturbances across this continent in recent years.
Not so quickly, at least.
jpnChrName: ここ数年の類似の事件と こうも早く結びつけるとは。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数年の類似の事件と
こうも早く結びつけるとは。

engChrName: I'm just goin' off hearsay, though. I'm guessin' you're a lot more in the know about 'em than I am.
engSearchText:
I'm just goin' off hearsay, though. I'm guessin' you're
a lot more in the know about 'em than I am.
jpnChrName: 俺のは又聞き程度だ。 お前さんの方が詳しそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
俺のは又聞き程度だ。
お前さんの方が詳しそうだな？

engChrName: There have been numerous cases in the past few years of disturbances in the septium veins causing abnormalities.
engSearchText:
There have been numerous cases in the past few years
of disturbances in the septium veins
causing abnormalities.
jpnChrName: かつて内戦や大戦を起こした帝国、 独立国や再事変のあったクロスベル……
jpnSearchText:
かつて内戦や大戦を起こした帝国、
独立国や再事変のあったクロスベル……

engChrName: During Erebonia's civil and international wars, or Crossbell's unilateral independence declaration and recent occupation, for example.
engSearchText:
During Erebonia's civil and international wars, or
Crossbell's unilateral independence declaration and
recent occupation, for example.
jpnChrName: それらの地で『七耀脈』への干渉によって、 異変が起きた事例が確認されています。
jpnSearchText:
それらの地で『七耀脈』への干渉によって、
異変が起きた事例が確認されています。

engChrName: Septium veins...?
engSearchText: Septium veins...?
jpnChrName: しちようみゃく……ですか。
jpnSearchText: しちようみゃく……ですか。

engChrName: I remember hearing about them in the past from Gien. Something about them flowing under the continent and being the source of all life.
engSearchText:
I remember hearing about them in the past
from Gien. Something about them flowing under the
continent and being the source of all life.
jpnChrName: 昔ギエン爺さんから聞いたな。 大陸中の地下を巡ってる万象の源……
jpnSearchText:
昔ギエン爺さんから聞いたな。
大陸中の地下を巡ってる万象の源……

engChrName: They're called 'dragon veins' in the East.
engSearchText: They're called 'dragon veins' in the East.
jpnChrName: 東方じゃ“龍脈”とも言われてるが。
jpnSearchText: 東方じゃ“龍脈”とも言われてるが。

engChrName: Indeed. Interference with the septium veins has produced a number of distinctive phenomena.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Interference with the septium veins has
produced a number of distinctive phenomena.
jpnChrName: はい、それらに干渉があった結果として 様々な異常現象が発生したそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
はい、それらに干渉があった結果として
様々な異常現象が発生したそうですが……

engChrName: Among them is the emergence of new monsters, as well as existing ones becoming noticeably more aggressive.
engSearchText:
Among them is the emergence of new monsters, as
well as existing ones becoming noticeably
more aggressive.
jpnChrName: ──代表的なものとして 魔獣の凶暴化、新種の魔獣の発生。
jpnSearchText:
──代表的なものとして
魔獣の凶暴化、新種の魔獣の発生。

engChrName: It has also resulted in the appearance of giant monsters from a higher plane known as 'cryptids.'
engSearchText:
It has also resulted in the appearance of giant
monsters from a higher plane known as 'cryptids.'
jpnChrName: 更には高位次元に属する“幻獣”という 巨大魔獣なども現れたそうです。
jpnSearchText:
更には高位次元に属する“幻獣”という
巨大魔獣なども現れたそうです。

engChrName: Th-This is all news to me...
engSearchText: Th-This is all news to me...
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事が……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな事が……

engChrName: That does sound similar to what's happening here.
engSearchText: That does sound similar to what's happening here.
jpnChrName: さっきの魔獣といい、 この状況と少し似ていますね……
jpnSearchText:
さっきの魔獣といい、
この状況と少し似ていますね……

engChrName: Assuming there IS a connection, then what's happening here in Basel...
engSearchText:
Assuming there IS a connection, then what's
happening here in Basel...
jpnChrName: もしそうだとしたら、 バーゼルで現在起きているのは──
jpnSearchText:
もしそうだとしたら、
バーゼルで現在起きているのは──

engChrName: There's still no signs of life inside the building. If someone was in there, I'd figure that battle would've drawn them out.
engSearchText:
There's still no signs of life inside the building.
If someone was in there, I'd figure that battle
would've drawn them out.
jpnChrName: ……今の騒ぎでも反応がない。 中に人はいなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
……今の騒ぎでも反応がない。
中に人はいなさそうだな。

engChrName: It looks like we might've come here for nothing, but we still might find somethin' useful in there.
engSearchText:
It looks like we might've come here for nothing, but
we still might find somethin' useful in there.
jpnChrName: 外れの可能性は高そうだが…… 何か手がかりがあるかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
外れの可能性は高そうだが……
何か手がかりがあるかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Yeah. I think we should have a good look inside just in case.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I think we should have a good look inside just
in case.
jpnChrName: はい…… 念の為、調べてみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
念の為、調べてみましょう。

engChrName: There's rust everywhere...and not a soul to be seen.
engSearchText: There's rust everywhere...and not a soul to be seen.
jpnChrName: あちこち錆びついてんな…… やっぱり人はいなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
あちこち錆びついてんな……
やっぱり人はいなさそうだが。

engChrName: That PC over there's plugged in. There's a cable connecting it to the orbal network, even.
engSearchText:
That PC over there's plugged in. There's a cable
connecting it to the orbal network, even.
jpnChrName: あっちの端末は生きてるな。 導力ネットのケーブルも繋がってる。
jpnSearchText:
あっちの端末は生きてるな。
導力ネットのケーブルも繋がってる。

engChrName: I wonder if that belonged to Professor Callaghan.
engSearchText: I wonder if that belonged to Professor Callaghan.
jpnChrName: もしかしてキャラハン先生が……？
jpnSearchText: もしかしてキャラハン先生が……？

engChrName: Does it seem like you'll be able to get anything off of it?
engSearchText:
Does it seem like you'll be able to get anything off
of it?
jpnChrName: 調べられそうですか？
jpnSearchText: 調べられそうですか？

engChrName: ...I'm afraid not. He's got it locked down hard.
engSearchText: ...I'm afraid not. He's got it locked down hard.
jpnChrName: ……ダメだ、何重にも プロテクトがかけられている。
jpnSearchText:
……ダメだ、何重にも
プロテクトがかけられている。

engChrName: Allow me. My scanning software should have us inside within ten minutes or so.
engSearchText:
Allow me. My scanning software should have us
inside within ten minutes or so.
jpnChrName: 専用の走査（スキャニング）アプリを使います。 十数分もあればロックを解除できるかと。
jpnSearchText:
専用の走査（スキャニング）アプリを使います。
十数分もあればロックを解除できるかと。

engChrName: Incredible... You're so fast and yet so precise at the same time.
engSearchText:
Incredible... You're so fast and yet so precise at the
same time.
jpnChrName: ……凄いですね…… 精密で、それでいて速い。
jpnSearchText:
……凄いですね……
精密で、それでいて速い。

engChrName: Thank you.
engSearchText: Thank you.
jpnChrName: 恐れ入ります。
jpnSearchText: 恐れ入ります。

engChrName: (Almost TOO fast. It's almost like she's...)
engSearchText: (Almost TOO fast. It's almost like she's...)
jpnChrName: （……でも、なんだろう。   この速さはまるで……）
jpnSearchText:
（……でも、なんだろう。
この速さはまるで……）

engChrName: Huh.
engSearchText: Huh.
jpnChrName: こいつは──
jpnSearchText: こいつは──

engChrName: This looks to be Professor Callaghan's notes about the past few weeks.
engSearchText:
This looks to be Professor Callaghan's notes about
the past few weeks.
jpnChrName: ……キャラハン先生の手記。 ここ数週間のものみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
……キャラハン先生の手記。
ここ数週間のものみたいです。

engChrName: 'I have finally found the investor I have been seeking.'
engSearchText: 'I have finally found the investor I have been seeking.'
jpnChrName: 『４月某日──探し求めた   スポンサーがようやく見つかった。』
jpnSearchText:
『４月某日──探し求めた
スポンサーがようやく見つかった。』

engChrName: We exchanged messages a few times over the orbal network before a representative from the Anchorville Company came to visit me directly.
engSearchText:
We exchanged messages a few times over the orbal
network before a representative from the Anchorville
Company came to visit me directly.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットでの数回のやり取りの後、 《アンカーヴィル商会》の営業が訪ねてきた。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットでの数回のやり取りの後、
《アンカーヴィル商会》の営業が訪ねてきた。

engChrName: I already suspected that they were affiliated with the infamous 'A,' and sure enough, he freely admitted as much.
engSearchText:
I already suspected that they were affiliated with the
infamous 'A,' and sure enough, he freely admitted
as much.
jpnChrName: そして睨んでいた通り──彼はあの《Ａ》の “関連企業”であることをあっけなく明かした。
jpnSearchText:
そして睨んでいた通り──彼はあの《Ａ》の
“関連企業”であることをあっけなく明かした。

engChrName: He offered to give me almost unlimited funding in exchange for performing an experiment under certain special conditions.
engSearchText:
He offered to give me almost unlimited funding in
exchange for performing an experiment under certain
special conditions.
jpnChrName: 彼らは莫大な資金と引き換えに “ある条件下での実験”も提案してきた。
jpnSearchText:
彼らは莫大な資金と引き換えに
“ある条件下での実験”も提案してきた。

engChrName: If I were to agree to all of those conditions, it would change everything.
engSearchText:
If I were to agree to all of those conditions, it would
change everything.
jpnChrName: 幾つかあるその“条件”を実現すれば──
jpnSearchText: <C8>幾つかあるその“条件”を実現すれば──

engChrName: It would dramatically increase the speed at which I can do my research—fundamentally alter what is possible.
engSearchText:
It would dramatically increase the speed at which I
can do my research—fundamentally alter what
is possible.
jpnChrName: 実験のスピードを飛躍的に高め、不可能と 思われた理論構築を現実のものに出来るという。
jpnSearchText:
実験のスピードを飛躍的に高め、不可能と
思われた理論構築を現実のものに出来るという。

engChrName: After much thought and soul searching, I agreed to a portion of their conditions in order to finally take back my place ahead of Cronkite.
engSearchText:
After much thought and soul searching, I agreed to a
portion of their conditions in order to finally take
back my place ahead of Cronkite.
jpnChrName: 迷った末に私は“条件の一部”を受け入れた── 何としてもあのクロンカイトに勝つために。
jpnSearchText:
迷った末に私は“条件の一部”を受け入れた──
何としてもあのクロンカイトに勝つために。

engChrName: These are the bare minimum of conditions required for me to prevail.
engSearchText:
These are the bare minimum of conditions required
for me to prevail.
jpnChrName: 前提となる“最低限の条件”──
jpnSearchText: <C8>前提となる“最低限の条件”──

engChrName: By using parallel-distributed computing to harness the resources of the entire city, the preparations for my task are almost complete.
engSearchText:
By using parallel-distributed computing to harness
the resources of the entire city, the preparations for
my task are almost complete.
jpnChrName: 都市全体を利用しての“並列分散処理”により、 ついに全ての準備が整おうとしている。
jpnSearchText:
都市全体を利用しての“並列分散処理”により、
ついに全ての準備が整おうとしている。

engChrName: However, there is still a vast wall that needs to be overcome.
engSearchText:
However, there is still a vast wall that needs to
be overcome.
jpnChrName: だが、まだ最後の“壁”が残っている。
jpnSearchText: <C8>だが、まだ最後の“壁”が残っている。

engChrName: Climbing this wall is nigh impossible—at least, not without accepting their final condition as well.
engSearchText:
Climbing this wall is nigh impossible—at least,
not without accepting their final condition
as well.
jpnChrName: この“壁”はまったくもって容易ではない。 それこそ“最後の条件”を受け入れなくては──
jpnSearchText:
この“壁”はまったくもって容易ではない。
それこそ“最後の条件”を受け入れなくては──

engChrName: I suspect I will have to wrestle with what to do on that front until the very end...but come what may, I must succeed. I must.
engSearchText:
I suspect I will have to wrestle with what to do on
that front until the very end...but come what may, I
must succeed. I must.
jpnChrName: ……最後まで迷うことになりそうだが、 いずれにせよ、必ずや成し遂げてみせよう。
jpnSearchText:
……最後まで迷うことになりそうだが、
いずれにせよ、必ずや成し遂げてみせよう。

engChrName: For my goal is the realization of the seemingly impossible: the creation of nuclear weapons.
engSearchText:
For my goal is the realization of the seemingly
impossible: the creation of nuclear weapons.
jpnChrName: 空想と思われていた未来の兵器── 《反応兵器（リアクターウエポン）》を、この手で生み出すために。
jpnSearchText:
空想と思われていた未来の兵器──
《反応兵器（リアクターウエポン）》を、この手で生み出すために。

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: ……カトル君………
jpnSearchText: ……カトル君………

engChrName: Hmph. Looks like we struck gold here after all.
engSearchText: Hmph. Looks like we struck gold here after all.
jpnChrName: ハン……当たりだったみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: ハン……当たりだったみてぇだな。

engChrName: That professor with the glasses was right.
engSearchText: That professor with the glasses was right.
jpnChrName: 眼鏡の先生から聞いちゃいたが……
jpnSearchText: 眼鏡の先生から聞いちゃいたが……

engChrName: ...This doesn't change anything, right? You still don't think it's possible he could actually pull off what he's claiming he can?
engSearchText:
...This doesn't change anything, right? You still don't
think it's possible he could actually pull off what he's
claiming he can?
jpnChrName: ……同じことを改めて聞くが 実際、どれだけ現実味があるものなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
……同じことを改めて聞くが
実際、どれだけ現実味があるものなんだ？

engChrName: Absolutely not. Not with modern technology.
engSearchText: Absolutely not. Not with modern technology.
jpnChrName: やはり可能性は限りなくゼロです。 ……少なくとも現代の技術では。
jpnSearchText:
やはり可能性は限りなくゼロです。
……少なくとも現代の技術では。

engChrName: He would need to have stumbled upon something truly epoch-making to change that.
engSearchText:
He would need to have stumbled upon something
truly epoch-making to change that.
jpnChrName: それこそ何らかのブレイクスルー……
jpnSearchText: それこそ何らかのブレイクスルー……

engChrName: A huge paradigm shift. Another singularity, to use as an example.
engSearchText:
A huge paradigm shift. Another singularity, to use as
an example.
jpnChrName: 革命的転換（パラダイムシフト）や技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）が 今一度、起きない限りは……
jpnSearchText:
革命的転換（パラダイムシフト）や技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）が
今一度、起きない限りは……

engChrName: Even if that did happen, a lengthy process of testing, theorizing, and such would still be needed.
engSearchText:
Even if that did happen, a lengthy process of testing,
theorizing, and such would still be needed.
jpnChrName: ……仮にそれが起きたとしても 仮説と実証の繰り返しが必要になる筈……
jpnSearchText:
……仮にそれが起きたとしても
仮説と実証の繰り返しが必要になる筈……

engChrName: That's likely why Professor Epstein and his disciples never realized the technology, either.
engSearchText:
That's likely why Professor Epstein and his disciples
never realized the technology, either.
jpnChrName: だからこそエプスタイン博士や 三高弟でも届かなかったんでしょうから……
jpnSearchText:
だからこそエプスタイン博士や
三高弟でも届かなかったんでしょうから……

engChrName: ...No. I think it's more likely that they deliberately chose not to even try.
engSearchText:
...No. I think it's more likely that they deliberately
chose not to even try.
jpnChrName: いいえ──届こうとするのを戒めた。
jpnSearchText: いいえ──届こうとするのを戒めた。

engChrName: Still, those notes made it sound like he was close...
engSearchText: Still, those notes made it sound like he was close...
jpnChrName: で、でもさっきの手記には……
jpnSearchText: で、でもさっきの手記には……

engChrName: Like he was only a step or two away, yes.
engSearchText: Like he was only a step or two away, yes.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、あと一歩で そこに辿り着くような書き方でした。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、あと一歩で
そこに辿り着くような書き方でした。

engChrName: He mentioned parallel-distributed computing, too— although I couldn't hazard a guess as to what that 'final condition' he mentions could be.
engSearchText:
He mentioned parallel-distributed computing, too—
although I couldn't hazard a guess as to what that
'final condition' he mentions could be.
jpnChrName: 都市全体での並列分散処理……それに “最後の条件”というのは分かりませんが。
jpnSearchText:
都市全体での並列分散処理……それに
“最後の条件”というのは分かりませんが。

engChrName: Perhaps it refers to some kind of AI so advanced it could eliminate the need for decades of work?
engSearchText:
Perhaps it refers to some kind of AI so advanced it
could eliminate the need for decades of work?
jpnChrName: 何十年かかるか分からない“過程”を 一気に省略できるほどの強いＡＩ……？
jpnSearchText:
何十年かかるか分からない“過程”を
一気に省略できるほどの強いＡＩ……？

engChrName: But how would they even create or obtain such a thing?
engSearchText:
But how would they even create or obtain such
a thing?
jpnChrName: でもそんなもの、一体どうやって……
jpnSearchText: でもそんなもの、一体どうやって……

engChrName: Well, I think we've found all we're gonna find here. We should get back to the city.
engSearchText:
Well, I think we've found all we're gonna find here.
We should get back to the city.
jpnChrName: ……他に手がかりもなさそうだ。 いったん、持ち帰るしかねぇかもな。
jpnSearchText:
……他に手がかりもなさそうだ。
いったん、持ち帰るしかねぇかもな。

engChrName: I agree. Perhaps the CID, guild, or Renne might be able to help—
engSearchText:
I agree. Perhaps the CID, guild, or Renne might be
able to help—
jpnChrName: はい、ＣＩＤやギルド方面もですが もしかしたら先輩あたりなら──
jpnSearchText:
はい、ＣＩＤやギルド方面もですが
もしかしたら先輩あたりなら──

engChrName: ...What was that?
engSearchText: ...What was that?
jpnChrName: ……なんだァ、今の音は？
jpnSearchText: ……なんだァ、今の音は？

engChrName: It sounded like the water splashing outside.
engSearchText: It sounded like the water splashing outside.
jpnChrName: 水の音……でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: 水の音……でしょうか。

engChrName: It must've come from the swamp out front.
engSearchText: It must've come from the swamp out front.
jpnChrName: ……外の沼、からですね。
jpnSearchText: ……外の沼、からですね。

engChrName: ...Maybe we should look into it—just in case.
engSearchText: ...Maybe we should look into it—just in case.
jpnChrName: …………………… 一応、確かめてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
……………………
一応、確かめてみるぞ。

engChrName: Over there!
engSearchText: Over there!
jpnChrName: ──あそこです！
jpnSearchText: ──あそこです！
っ……

engChrName: ...Tch.
engSearchText: ...Tch.
jpnSearchText: ……チッ……

engChrName: Agnès! Quatre! Don't look!
engSearchText: Agnès! Quatre! Don't look!
jpnChrName: アニエス！ お前さんも見るな……！
jpnSearchText:
アニエス！
お前さんも見るな……！
───────────

engChrName: No... This can't...
engSearchText: No... This can't...
jpnSearchText: ………そ、そんな………

engChrName: Pro... PROFESSOR CALLAGHAN!
engSearchText:
Pro...
PROFESSOR CALLAGHAN!
jpnChrName: キャ── キャラハン先生ぇぇっ……！！！？
jpnSearchText:
キャ──
キャラハン先生ぇぇっ……！！！？

engChrName: The cause of death was drowning.
engSearchText: The cause of death was drowning.
jpnChrName: ……死因は溺死。
jpnSearchText: ……死因は溺死。

engChrName: I suspect he was knocked unconscious before being thrown into the swamp.
engSearchText:
I suspect he was knocked unconscious before being
thrown into the swamp.
jpnChrName: 何らかの形で気絶させられたあと 沼に投げ捨てられた……そんな所ね。
jpnSearchText:
何らかの形で気絶させられたあと
沼に投げ捨てられた……そんな所ね。

engChrName: Send the body for an autopsy right away.
engSearchText: Send the body for an autopsy right away.
jpnChrName: すぐ検死に回して頂戴。
jpnSearchText: すぐ検死に回して頂戴。

engChrName: Yes, ma'am!
engSearchText: Yes, ma'am!
jpnChrName: はッ。
jpnSearchText: はッ。

engChrName: Hold on a minute!
engSearchText: Hold on a minute!
jpnChrName: ちょっと待った……！
jpnSearchText: ちょっと待った……！

engChrName: ...I'll leave this to you.
engSearchText: ...I'll leave this to you.
jpnChrName: ……任せたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……任せたぜ。

engChrName: Of course you will. This is out of your jurisdiction.
engSearchText: Of course you will. This is out of your jurisdiction.
jpnChrName: ええ、元より貴方たちの 領分じゃないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、元より貴方たちの
領分じゃないでしょう。

engChrName: Why's a murder happening all the way out here? Just what are you people covering up?!
engSearchText:
Why's a murder happening all the way out here?
Just what are you people covering up?!
jpnChrName: どうしてこんな所で殺人が── 当局は何を隠蔽している！？
jpnSearchText:
どうしてこんな所で殺人が──
当局は何を隠蔽している！？

engChrName: We are currently conducting an investigation. This area is off limits—
engSearchText:
We are currently conducting an investigation.
This area is off limits—
jpnChrName: こちらも現在調査中です。 そもそもまだ立ち入り許可は──
jpnSearchText:
こちらも現在調査中です。
そもそもまだ立ち入り許可は──

engChrName: We don't need your permission when a civilian is dead! Our code is all the permission we need!
engSearchText:
We don't need your permission when a civilian
is dead! Our code is all the permission we need!
jpnChrName: 民間人の犠牲となれば話は別だ！ 規約に則って立ち入らせてもらう！
jpnSearchText:
民間人の犠牲となれば話は別だ！
規約に則って立ち入らせてもらう！

engChrName: Don't you realize this murder could go unsolved if you charge in and start disturbing the crime scene?!
engSearchText:
Don't you realize this murder could go
unsolved if you charge in and start disturbing the
crime scene?!
jpnChrName: っ……現場保存の鉄則は 無視しないでもらいましょうか……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……現場保存の鉄則は
無視しないでもらいましょうか……！

engChrName: ...The pieces are just about coming together.
engSearchText: ...The pieces are just about coming together.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… ついに尻尾を出しやがったワケだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
ついに尻尾を出しやがったワケだ。

engChrName: Yeah. His abduction from the lab yesterday pointed in that direction, too...
engSearchText:
Yeah. His abduction from the lab yesterday pointed
in that direction, too...
jpnChrName: ああ── 昨日の研究室での拉致も含めて。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
昨日の研究室での拉致も含めて。

engChrName: ...but it's now crystal clear he made a deal with the mafia—and this is the end result.
engSearchText:
...but it's now crystal clear he made a deal with the
mafia—and this is the end result.
jpnChrName: “連中”との取引の末の 最期なのは疑いようもねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
“連中”との取引の末の
最期なのは疑いようもねぇだろう。

engChrName: It's Tharbad all over again...
engSearchText: It's Tharbad all over again...
jpnChrName: サルバッドと同様、ですか……
jpnSearchText: サルバッドと同様、ですか……

engChrName: The motive then was to stop the victim from talking and to make an example of him. Is it the same here, I wonder?
engSearchText:
The motive then was to stop the victim from talking
and to make an example of him. Is it the same here,
I wonder?
jpnChrName: あの時は“口封じ”と“見せしめ”…… 今回も同じかは分かりませんが。
jpnSearchText:
あの時は“口封じ”と“見せしめ”……
今回も同じかは分かりませんが。

engChrName: How can all of you be so calm?
engSearchText: How can all of you be so calm?
jpnChrName: ……随分と冷静なんですね、皆さん。
jpnSearchText: ……随分と冷静なんですね、皆さん。

engChrName: Someone was just murdered...
engSearchText: Someone was just murdered...
jpnChrName: 人が一人、死んだっていうのに……
jpnSearchText: 人が一人、死んだっていうのに……

engChrName: Oh, trust me—I'm burning with anger on the inside.
engSearchText: Oh, trust me—I'm burning with anger on the inside.
jpnChrName: ──いえ。 今にも灼けつきそうなくらいです。
jpnSearchText:
──いえ。
今にも灼けつきそうなくらいです。

engChrName: Those bastards have screwed us over again and again—and this is the perfect chance to make 'em pay for it.
engSearchText:
Those bastards have screwed us over again and
again—and this is the perfect chance to make 'em pay
for it.
jpnChrName: こちとら散々やられてるんだ…… ある意味、絶好の機会ってもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こちとら散々やられてるんだ……
ある意味、絶好の機会ってもんだぜ。

engChrName: So you do understand what I'm feeling...
engSearchText: So you do understand what I'm feeling...
jpnChrName: ……あなたたちも……
jpnSearchText: ……あなたたちも……

engChrName: They do, yes. They've both been through a lot.
engSearchText: They do, yes. They've both been through a lot.
jpnChrName: ……その、 ２人とも、色々あったんです。
jpnSearchText:
……その、
２人とも、色々あったんです。

engChrName: ...I'm sorry about what happened to the professor.
engSearchText: ...I'm sorry about what happened to the professor.
jpnChrName: ……先生のことは残念だった。
jpnSearchText: ……先生のことは残念だった。

engChrName: But we've been findin' more and more clues, which means we're probably gettin' to the heart of the matter.
engSearchText:
But we've been findin' more and more clues, which
means we're probably gettin' to the heart of
the matter.
jpnChrName: だが、色々と手がかりも出てきた── 核心に近づいてるのも確かだろう。
jpnSearchText:
だが、色々と手がかりも出てきた──
核心に近づいてるのも確かだろう。

engChrName: Which also means this ain't over—not yet. We've got to keep our cool if we're gonna get to the bottom of this.
engSearchText:
Which also means this ain't over—not yet. We've got
to keep our cool if we're gonna get to the bottom
of this.
jpnChrName: その意味でまだ何も終わっちゃいない…… 冷静に判断して辿り着くしかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
その意味でまだ何も終わっちゃいない……
冷静に判断して辿り着くしかねぇ。

engChrName: We can't pay 'em back with a hot head.
engSearchText: We can't pay 'em back with a hot head.
jpnChrName: 奴らに“借り”を返すにはな。
jpnSearchText: 奴らに“借り”を返すにはな。

engChrName: Pretty sure the key to solving all of this is gonna be the 'final condition' he mentioned in his notes.
engSearchText:
Pretty sure the key to solving all of this is gonna be
the 'final condition' he mentioned in his notes.
jpnChrName: やっぱり鍵になるのは、 手記にあった“最後の条件”だろう。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり鍵になるのは、
手記にあった“最後の条件”だろう。

engChrName: You remember the chaos in Crossbell a year and a half ago, right?
engSearchText:
You remember the chaos in Crossbell a year and a
half ago, right?
jpnChrName: 一年半前のクロスベルの再事変──
jpnSearchText: 一年半前のクロスベルの再事変──

engChrName: This is an oversimplification, but it all came about as the result of a technological singularity.
engSearchText:
This is an oversimplification, but it all came about as
the result of a technological singularity.
jpnChrName: 色々あったが、あれを起こした“黒幕”は 技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）を起こしたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
色々あったが、あれを起こした“黒幕”は
技術的特異点（シンギュラリティ）を起こしたらしい。

engChrName: Said singularity gave birth to superintelligence far beyond humanity's current capabilities.
engSearchText:
Said singularity gave birth to superintelligence far
beyond humanity's current capabilities.
jpnChrName: その時点での人間には到達不可能な 未来の技術が観測され、現実化し……
jpnSearchText:
その時点での人間には到達不可能な
未来の技術が観測され、現実化し……

engChrName: Then after everything came to an end, it was lost again.
engSearchText:
Then after everything came to an end, it was
lost again.
jpnChrName: 事件解決後にそれらの技術の全ては 一切失われちまったという。
jpnSearchText:
事件解決後にそれらの技術の全ては
一切失われちまったという。

engChrName: Th-That's quite a lot to take in...
engSearchText: Th-That's quite a lot to take in...
jpnChrName: ……！ そう、だったんですか……
jpnSearchText:
……！
そう、だったんですか……

engChrName: How do you even learn this shit? And you think we're dealing with tech like that here?
engSearchText:
How do you even learn this shit? And you think we're
dealing with tech like that here?
jpnChrName: またヤバイ裏情報を…… そうした技術が使われたってことか？
jpnSearchText:
またヤバイ裏情報を……
そうした技術が使われたってことか？

engChrName: No. It was well established by multiple sources that it is impossible to replicate the technology that was lost.
engSearchText:
No. It was well established by multiple sources that it
is impossible to replicate the technology that was lost.
jpnChrName: いえ、それらの技術が再現不可能であるのは 各方面の調査からも判明しています。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、それらの技術が再現不可能であるのは
各方面の調査からも判明しています。

engChrName: Of course, that doesn't preclude the possibility of humanity creating it themselves at some point in the future...
engSearchText:
Of course, that doesn't preclude the possibility of
humanity creating it themselves at some point in
the future...
jpnChrName: 逆に言えば、いずれ人類が再び到達する 可能性がある技術でもあるという事ですが……
jpnSearchText:
逆に言えば、いずれ人類が再び到達する
可能性がある技術でもあるという事ですが……

engChrName: ...but that could be decades or centuries in the future—and even a year and a half ago, nuclear weapons hadn't been created.
engSearchText:
...but that could be decades or centuries in the
future—and even a year and a half ago, nuclear
weapons hadn't been created.
jpnChrName: 数十年、ないし数百年かかるでしょうし、 その時も反応兵器は実現されませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
数十年、ないし数百年かかるでしょうし、
その時も反応兵器は実現されませんでした。

engChrName: So it's a similar deal as what happened then but still fundamentally different at its core...
engSearchText:
So it's a similar deal as what happened then but still
fundamentally different at its core...
jpnChrName: だったら似てるようで 根本的に違ってるってことか……
jpnSearchText:
だったら似てるようで
根本的に違ってるってことか……

engChrName: (Ugh... It's hard keeping up with all of this...)
engSearchText: (Ugh... It's hard keeping up with all of this...)
jpnChrName: （うう……   全然ついていけませんけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（うう……
全然ついていけませんけど……）

engChrName: You don't think the Geneses could be what makes it different, do you?
engSearchText:
You don't think the Geneses could be what makes it
different, do you?
jpnChrName: 違うというと……それこそ アニエスさんの《ゲネシス》では？
jpnSearchText:
違うというと……それこそ
アニエスさんの《ゲネシス》では？

engChrName: Heh. That's a good point.
engSearchText: Heh. That's a good point.
jpnChrName: ハッ、考えてみれば……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、考えてみれば……

engChrName: Yeah. I'd say you're on the right track, there.
engSearchText: Yeah. I'd say you're on the right track, there.
jpnChrName: ああ──鍵はそこだろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ──鍵はそこだろう。

engChrName: A puzzle piece that didn't exist in Crossbell then, but IS part of what's happening now.
engSearchText:
A puzzle piece that didn't exist in Crossbell then, but
IS part of what's happening now.
jpnChrName: 再事変の時には無かったフラグメント。
jpnSearchText: 再事変の時には無かったフラグメント。

engChrName: The prototype orbments that're even more of an enigma than artifacts and capable of bringin' about miracles.
engSearchText:
The prototype orbments that're even more of an
enigma than artifacts and capable of bringin'
about miracles.
jpnChrName: 古代遺物以上に不可解で謎めいた “奇蹟”を引き起こしてきた原型導力器。
jpnSearchText:
古代遺物以上に不可解で謎めいた
“奇蹟”を引き起こしてきた原型導力器。

engChrName: If we assume they ARE involved here...
engSearchText: If we assume they ARE involved here...
jpnChrName: 仮にそんなものがあるとしたら──
jpnSearchText: 仮にそんなものがあるとしたら──

engChrName: ...then it makes you wonder just what a final condition with them in the mix would look like.
engSearchText:
...then it makes you wonder just what a final
condition with them in the mix would look like.
jpnChrName: それを利用した“最後の条件”ってのは 具体的にはどんなモンになるんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
それを利用した“最後の条件”ってのは
具体的にはどんなモンになるんだろうな？

engChrName: Ah...
engSearchText: Ah...

engChrName: ...So it does.
engSearchText: ...So it does.

engChrName: That does seem like a valid approach.
engSearchText: That does seem like a valid approach.
jpnChrName: た、確かにそのアプローチなら……
jpnSearchText: た、確かにそのアプローチなら……

engChrName: Heh. Not bad, small fry.
engSearchText: Heh. Not bad, small fry.
jpnChrName: ……チッ…… おいチビ、やるじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
……チッ……
おいチビ、やるじゃねーか。

engChrName: Heehee... Thanks. (I still don't know what's going on, though.)
engSearchText:
Heehee... Thanks.
(I still don't know what's going on, though.)
jpnChrName: え、えへへ、まあそれほどでも。 （全然分かってませんけど……）
jpnSearchText:
え、えへへ、まあそれほどでも。
（全然分かってませんけど……）

engSearchText:
(We've already established that the issues with the

jpnChrName: （街で頻発する導力ネットと供給網の異常……   “並列分散処理”が原因なのは確定している。）

engChrName: We still don't know what they'll be used for here in Basel, either...
engSearchText:
We still don't know what they'll be used for here in
Basel, either...
jpnChrName: そして、おそらくバーゼルにも……
jpnSearchText: そして、おそらくバーゼルにも……

engChrName: Even if we assume they are involved here, we still don't know how they'll tie in to what is happening.
engSearchText:
Even if we assume they are involved here, we still
don't know how they'll tie in to what is happening.
jpnChrName: 今回の件に絡んでいるとして、 一体どう繋がっているのかが鍵でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
今回の件に絡んでいるとして、
一体どう繋がっているのかが鍵でしょう。

engChrName: ...Yeah. And there doesn't seem to be a clear pattern we can deduce from all of the other cases to guide us.
engSearchText:
...Yeah. And there doesn't seem to be a clear pattern
we can deduce from all of the other cases to guide us.
jpnChrName: ……聞かせてもらった各ケースを考えても パターンを特定するのは難しそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……聞かせてもらった各ケースを考えても
パターンを特定するのは難しそうですね。

engChrName: Actually, I might as well ask. You don't think having somethin' like that would let them develop impossible tech, right?
engSearchText:
Actually, I might as well ask. You don't think having
somethin' like that would let them develop impossible
tech, right?
jpnChrName: 一応確認だが、そういうチートアイテムで 研究が進むってのはあるのか？
jpnSearchText:
一応確認だが、そういうチートアイテムで
研究が進むってのはあるのか？

engChrName: No. It's highly unlikely.
engSearchText: No. It's highly unlikely.
jpnChrName: 基本的には、ない……と思っていいでしょう。
jpnSearchText: 基本的には、ない……と思っていいでしょう。

engChrName: There are exceptions, like whatever happened a year and a half ago—which I don't know much about, I'll admit.
engSearchText:
There are exceptions, like whatever happened a year
and a half ago—which I don't know much about,
I'll admit.
jpnChrName: 僕も詳しくは知りませんが、一年半前の 事件の時のような例外もありはしますが……
jpnSearchText:
僕も詳しくは知りませんが、一年半前の
事件の時のような例外もありはしますが……

engChrName: But that was a very special case.
engSearchText: But that was a very special case.
jpnChrName: あれはかなり特殊なケースでしょう。
jpnSearchText: あれはかなり特殊なケースでしょう。

engChrName: None of the technology that was used back then has been used since.
engSearchText:
None of the technology that was used back then has
been used since.
jpnChrName: 実際あの時使われたという各技術がその後 広まったという話は聞いていません。
jpnSearchText:
実際あの時使われたという各技術がその後
広まったという話は聞いていません。

engChrName: Technology is almost always developed in a clear, progressive manner—without any large gaps or sudden leaps.
engSearchText:
Technology is almost always developed in a clear,
progressive manner—without any large gaps or
sudden leaps.
jpnChrName: 新技術確立はあくまでロジカルなものですから、 魔法みたいな飛躍はないですよ。
jpnSearchText:
新技術確立はあくまでロジカルなものですから、
魔法みたいな飛躍はないですよ。

engChrName: Umm... How do you explain the Orbal Revolution, then?
engSearchText:
Umm... How do you explain the Orbal
Revolution, then?
jpnChrName: えっと……でしたら、《導力革命》は どう解釈すればいいでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
えっと……でしたら、《導力革命》は
どう解釈すればいいでしょう？

engChrName: I believe those devices then were only used to learn how orbal phenomena worked...
engSearchText:
I believe those devices then were only used to learn
how orbal phenomena worked...
jpnChrName: ５０年前の《導力革命》においても、 その装置群はあくまで導力現象の作動と──
jpnSearchText:
５０年前の《導力革命》においても、
その装置群はあくまで導力現象の作動と──

engChrName: ...as well as to learn how to apply those phenomena elsewhere.
engSearchText:
...as well as to learn how to apply those
phenomena elsewhere.
jpnChrName: 応用原理を解明するためだけに 使われたみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
応用原理を解明するためだけに
使われたみたいです。

engChrName: They didn't create new technology from scratch so much as improve the development environment and enable it to become what it was.
engSearchText:
They didn't create new technology from scratch so
much as improve the development environment and
enable it to become what it was.
jpnChrName: 装置が新技術を生み出したというよりは 技術確立のための諸条件や環境を改善することに……
jpnSearchText:
装置が新技術を生み出したというよりは
技術確立のための諸条件や環境を改善することに……

engChrName: Which in itself is a...significant...
engSearchText: Which in itself is a...significant...
jpnChrName: 大きな……意味が…………

engChrName: So that may be what we're dealing with.
engSearchText: So that may be what we're dealing with.
jpnChrName: そういうことでしたか。
jpnSearchText: そういうことでしたか。

engChrName: You can't create new technology out of nowhere like magic.
engSearchText:
You can't create new technology out of nowhere
like magic.
jpnChrName: 新技術そのものを魔法のように 生み出すことは出来ないけれど──
jpnSearchText:
新技術そのものを魔法のように
生み出すことは出来ないけれど──

engChrName: However, if you can somehow create a development environment that defies common sense...
engSearchText:
However, if you can somehow create a development
environment that defies common sense...
jpnChrName: 常識では考えられない“環境”を 用意すれば、あるいは………！
jpnSearchText:
常識では考えられない“環境”を
用意すれば、あるいは………！

engChrName: It's all fallin' into place now.
engSearchText: It's all fallin' into place now.
jpnChrName: 見えてきたな。
jpnSearchText: 見えてきたな。

engChrName: Exactly!
engSearchText: Exactly!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Sounds like we haven't got time to waste!
engSearchText: Sounds like we haven't got time to waste!
jpnChrName: そうと分かれば、ますます グダグダしちゃいられねえな！
jpnSearchText:
そうと分かれば、ますます
グダグダしちゃいられねえな！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい、早く行きましょう！
jpnSearchText: はい、早く行きましょう！

engChrName: So this is the path through Auge Canyon. It certainly fits the name.
engSearchText:
So this is the path through Auge Canyon.
It certainly fits the name.
jpnChrName: ここがオージュ峡谷道ですか……！ まさに峡谷といった感じの場所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ここがオージュ峡谷道ですか……！
まさに峡谷といった感じの場所ですね。

engChrName: The terrain off the paved path appears to be quite complex.
engSearchText:
The terrain off the paved path appears to be
quite complex.
jpnChrName: ええ、人の手が入っている道から外れると とても複雑な自然地形になっているようです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、人の手が入っている道から外れると
とても複雑な自然地形になっているようです。

engChrName: Watch your footing, guys, or you're gonna be flyin' headfirst into the river.
engSearchText:
Watch your footing, guys, or you're gonna be flyin'
headfirst into the river.
jpnChrName: うっかり足を踏み外したりすんじゃねえぞ？ 下を流れてる川まで真っ逆さまだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
うっかり足を踏み外したりすんじゃねえぞ？
下を流れてる川まで真っ逆さまだろうからな。

engChrName: You could take this road to the Liberl Kingdom, right?
engSearchText:
You could take this road to the Liberl
Kingdom, right?
jpnChrName: あっ……この道を進むと リベール王国に繋がってるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あっ……この道を進むと
リベール王国に繋がってるんですね。

engChrName: If you wanted, yes—though it would take you several hours to get there even by vehicle.
engSearchText:
If you wanted, yes—though it would take you several
hours to get there even by vehicle.
jpnChrName: ええ、導力車でも辿り着くまで 数時間かかると思われますが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、導力車でも辿り着くまで
数時間かかると思われますが……

engChrName: On the other side of the border is a fortress in the Zeiss region.
engSearchText:
On the other side of the border is a fortress in the
Zeiss region.
jpnChrName: リベールの国境を超えると、 ツァイス地方の砦に繋がっているそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
リベールの国境を超えると、
ツァイス地方の砦に繋がっているそうですね。

engChrName: Signs like these really make it clear just how far from the capital we are.
engSearchText:
Signs like these really make it clear just how far from
the capital we are.
jpnChrName: こんな標識を見れちまうとは 首都からずいぶん遠くまで来たもんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
こんな標識を見れちまうとは
首都からずいぶん遠くまで来たもんだよな。

engChrName: We've been jumpin' all over the country so much lately... Sheesh.
engSearchText:
We've been jumpin' all over the country so
much lately... Sheesh.
jpnChrName: 最近は遠出する機会が多すぎだし やれやれだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
最近は遠出する機会が多すぎだし
やれやれだぜ……

engChrName: You're just happy to have an excuse to drive around and you know it.
engSearchText:
You're just happy to have an excuse to drive around
and you know it.
jpnChrName: とか言いつつ、 車を出せる機会が多くて嬉しいんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
とか言いつつ、
車を出せる機会が多くて嬉しいんだろ？

engChrName: Hey, I'm a simple guy.
engSearchText: Hey, I'm a simple guy.
jpnChrName: ハッ……ま、否定はしねえけどな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……ま、否定はしねえけどな。

engChrName: Well, let's get that holo core test started, shall we?
engSearchText: Well, let's get that holo core test started, shall we?
jpnChrName: よし、そんじゃホロウコアの テストを始めるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
よし、そんじゃホロウコアの
テストを始めるとすっか。

engChrName: Our task is to equip Pocel and act five times while S-Boosted.
engSearchText:
Our task is to equip Pocel and act five times
while S-Boosted.
jpnChrName: 《ポケル》を装備して、『Ｓブースト』の 状態のまま５回行動をするんでしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
《ポケル》を装備して、『Ｓブースト』の
状態のまま５回行動をするんでしたよね。

engChrName: Right! Let's go!
engSearchText: Right! Let's go!
jpnChrName: よーし、頑張りましょう！
jpnSearchText: よーし、頑張りましょう！

engChrName: Change your holo core by pressing  in the Orbment menu.
engSearchText:
Change your holo core by pressing in the
Orbment menu.
jpnChrName: ホロウコアは、メインメニュー・オーブメント画面から を押すことで変更できます。
jpnSearchText:
ホロウコアは、メインメニュー・オーブメント画面から
を押すことで変更できます。
